column1: Little Goat Diner////We have walked by this place a few times
column2: finally just stopping in because I was tired of flipping through Yelp photos. No reservation
column3: but they take your name and text you when you're up. Great. The few benches outside made the 25 minute wait not too bad. The staff was amazing and we selected 3 different plates to share
